name: Task Force 88: Hostile Contact
description:
Featuring six exciting game play modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Conquest, Rush, Capture the Flag, and Kill Confirmed.

Play as single player with AI bots, or multiplayer, online or LAN.

Engage your opponents in either close quarter combat or long-distance battles. Communicate with others via in-game text and global proximity voice chat.
